column4: im new to linux (complete noob) and installed ubuntu in hope of gaining knowledge, i did the install it went good ran updates on the net and it went good rebooted and now my net is gone
i chekced th0 and it was not active so i actived it
but now my net still isnt up
how do i get it to work?
how do i renew my ip address?
ifconfig
i know views it
but i dunno how to renew
I'm checking...
I think the easiest way is: "ifdown eth0" and then "ifup eth0"
Of course that assumes the interface is called eth0, but that's the norm.
Let me know how it goes.
are you using a static address or DHCP?
at home or in the office?
do other pc's on the net work?
Sorry, trying to help 2 a t a time... Is it DHCP?
That's the loopback, ignore that... No eth0 ??
The password is the same as the password that you created for your user
Try sudo ifconfig
Te same as for the user you created
I lost you... I've gotta go now...
